hadiths.text: Narrated Ata ibn Yasar: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: Sadaqah may not be given to rich man, with the exception of five classes: One who fights in Allah's path, or who collects it, or a debtor, or a man who buys it with his money, or a man who has a poor neighbour who has been given sadaqah and gives a present to the rich man

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ يَجُوزُ لَهُ أَخْذُ الصَّدَقَةِ وَهُوَ غَنِيٌّ
chapter.eng-name: The Rich Person Who Is Allowed To Accept Sadaqah
